Welcome to the Postgenomic Wiki

The idea behind the wiki is to

  • provide easily-updatable help pages
  • Keep developers up to date with changes to the API
  • Promote science blogging
  • Provide a forum for questions / feature requests

Here are some links to other pages on the wiki to help you get started

Submitting or marking posts as Reviews - what, why, how?

How are Stats liked journal and blog rankings calculated?

Who to contact if you’ve got a question about Postgenomic.
